title: Unbitten
description: Jo Martin is off to France to start her dream job showing horses for two aristocratic brothers at Château Gagnon. She quickly falls for David, the charismatic and deeply hot younger brother, but unsettling questions arise. The older brother, Henri, the Marquis de la Motte, is steady where his younger brother is impetuous. His great work is developing products for his vampire brethren, making them safer as they live among humans.Jo is caught between the brothers, uncertain of what is real and what is myth. When a young woman, a guest at the Château goes missing, all Jo knows is that she can't trust anyone.Vampires. Scorching hot sex. Pastries. French aristocrats. This is the world of Unbitten.Author's Note: adult content.
author: Valerie du Sange
